docs.lead_paragraph: Scientists tackling an outbreak of Ebola in Guinea believe they have identified the virus as the Zaire strain, the most lethal of all that "raises the already high level of concern", according to France's Institut Pasteur.

headline.main: Guinea Ebola Outbreak Believed to Be Deadly Zaire Strain
headline.print_headline: Guinea Ebola Outbreak Believed to Be Deadly Zaire Strain

docs.snippet: Scientists tackling an outbreak of Ebola in Guinea believe they have identified the virus as the Zaire strain, the most lethal of all that "raises the already high level of concern", according to France's Institut Pasteur.

docs.lead_paragraph: Health officials fighting an outbreak of Ebola in Guinea on Sunday dispatched specialised medical equipment, imposed restrictions on funerals and sought to contain panic to prevent the fever from spreading.

headline.main: Guinea Dispatches Equipment to Contain Outbreak of Ebola
headline.print_headline: Guinea Dispatches Equipment to Contain Outbreak of Ebola

docs.snippet: Health officials fighting an outbreak of Ebola in Guinea on Sunday dispatched specialised medical equipment, imposed restrictions on funerals and sought to contain panic to prevent the fever from spreading.
